node.display_long_description:
A portal to new worlds, a virtual home filled with endless experiences to discover and explore, a place to connect with loved ones. World travel, casual games, media customization,  adventure, and relaxation.

- Invite your friends and family, and travel together to new places to see the world - hundreds of virtual travels to all continents: take a city tour, a hot air balloon ride, a back-country road trip
- Explore the depth of the ocean - go diving in the Great Barrier Reef of Australia, or swim with dolphins in the Pacific Ocean
- Relax and practice meditation in nature - guided, or unguided
- Listen to classical music
- Play with your virtual pet
- Play games, share photos, upload and watch your own videos - standard, and 360, and step into them together.

Alcove has something for everyone, no matter your age. Download Alcove and start exploring today!

Note: Alcove will keep growing with new immersive experiences and features. Please let us know what you’d love to see next.

latest_supported_binary.change_log:
1.152
- Minor fixes.

1.151
- Major update to Alcove Settings!
       - Added option for Smooth Locomotion.
       - Added option for Visible Avatars in Media.
       - Visual update to improve clarity.
- Fixed several issues related to account usage.
- Improved loading times.
- Fixed missing effects in certain environments.
- Avatars now fade out within a certain distance.
- Keyboard improvements.
- Fixed being unable to interact with UI in certain positions.
- Several bug fixes and performance improvements.

1.142
- Minor fixes for in-app account creation.

1.141
- New experience: MultiBrush by Rendever  - Available on App Lab!
- Don't have an Alcove account? We've added in-app account creation.
- Into Space DLC now has preview trailers.
- Reduced app size.
- Bug fixes and Optimization.

1.129
- New experience: Jigsaw 360 - Multiplayer coming soon!
- New videos from Malta in the travel globe!
- Fixed issue where multiple avatars would overlap when teleporting
- Fixed issue where avatar profile icons would load incorrectly

node.display_short_description: Take off into space with 2 gravity-defying expeditions, 14 and 11 minutes each. These award-winning short VR films from Faber Courtial took the world by storm at Cannes XR, Venice Film Festival, Tribeca and many more, by conveying how it must feel to actually be out in the open cosmos. Visit unknown worlds of extraordinary richness, detail and authenticity - perfectly reconstructed in 3D from original NASA and ESA data.

purchase_alerts.message: 这是附加内容，需要有主游戏 (Alcove) 才能玩

nodes.title: Celebrate Mother's Day in Alcove!
nodes.body_text:
"A mother's love knows no bounds."

This Mother's Day meet with Mom in Alcove and share two critically acclaimed heartwarming experiences, Dear Mom and Ama's Momento by AmaVR

While struggling to become a successful VR artist, an Asian-American woman comes home to visit her Mom after years of separation in Dear Mom.  The  360º immersive experience shows the viewer the emotional strain caused by separation, conflict of cultures, generational differences, and dreams that are common among the Asian community. Dear Mom is also a campaign dedicated to appreciating mother figures through the act of gift-giving, and sharing experiences through virtual reality.

Ama's Momento not only celebrates Taiwanese art and culture, but also invites us into the special moments of the life of Director Awu Chen's grandmother, Ama, and her dream of building an art museum. Ama's Momento inspired the Taiwanese Ministry of Art and Culture to recognize her collection as being “Taiwan’s Most Valuable.”

"Heart-achingly thoughtful" - LA Times

Winner of IndieCade 2019, Location-Based & Live Play Award
Finalist of VR For Change 2020, AlcoveVR Challenge
https://www.amavr.com/

Launch Dear Mom and Ama's Momento from the framed photos in the Travel Room. Host a viewing party with up to three friends for a unique experience of complex family relationships and following dreams.

Happy Mother's Day from Team Alcove!

nodes.title: Tulipomania! Take a Vibrant 360 Journey Into the 17th Century Tulip Craze
nodes.body_text:
Unearth 17th century tales of Tulipomania in Alcove! Visit a 3D field of tulips where fine art paintings illustrate the majestic flower's historical prestige, power and influence, that might be more fantasy than fact.

Tulipomania is a vibrant 360 journey into one of the ultimate rites of Spring: Dutch Tulips - and it's just in time for Mother's Day, Sunday May 9th!

We look forward to bringing you more colorful and unique ways to connect with loved ones in VR and experience world travel from the comfort and safety of home.

Don't hesitate to share your recommendat ions with us at feedback@alcovevr.com. We're always happy to hear about what you'd like to see and do next in Alcove!

Happy Exploring - Team Alcove

node.reviewDescription: I really enjoy Alcove. I love having the ability to relax and meditate by the ocean or in the backyard.￼ However, I really wish there were an option to connect to Kindle or Nook and have the ability to read books on the interactive screens while enjoying the scenery. Or possibly connecting to Audible through the headset.
node.reviewTitle: Needs option to connect to Kindle,Nook..

developerResponse.body:
Thanks for your support and kind words Anica22!  We're always updating Alcove with fresh new content and these are fantastic ideas to add to our wish list for a future release. 

In the meantime we hope you enjoy the latest release featuring MultiBrush by Rendever, a social 3D painting experience based on TiltBrush where you can create and share art with friends. Click on the blue paint can in the corner of the Living Room TV to launch single player, then in MultiBrush, open a room to invite your Oculus friends. Check out the unique set of brushes, environments and effects that only VR can deliver!

If you have any questions or more suggestions, please contact us at any time at, feedback@alcovevr.com. Happy exploring and all of our best, Team Alcove
